item.text: After five days the high priest Ananias came down with some elders and an attorney named Tertullus, and they brought formal charges against Paul to the governor.

When <st data-num="846" class="">Paul</st><n id="1" /> had been <st data-num="2564" class="">summoned</st>, <st data-num="5061" class="">Tertullus</st> <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="2723" class="">accuse</st> him,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “We have <st data-num="5177" class="">experienced</st> a <st data-num="4183">lengthy time</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> rule,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2735" class="">reforms</st><n id="5" /> are being <st data-num="1096" class="">made</st> in <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4307" class="">foresight</st>.<n id="7" />

<st data-num="2903">Most excellent</st> <st data-num="5344" class="">Felix</st>,<n id="1" /> we <st data-num="588" class="">acknowledge</st> this <st data-num="3837" class="">everywhere</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> in <st data-num="3839">every way</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2169" class="">gratitude</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> I may <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1465" class="">delay</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">any</st> <st data-num="4119" class="">further</st>, I <st data-num="3870" class="">beg</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="4935" class="">briefly</st><n id="3" /> with <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1932">customary graciousness</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we have <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> to be a <st data-num="3061" class="">troublemaker</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3061" class="">one</st> who <st data-num="2795">stirs up</st> <st data-num="4714" class="">riots</st><n id="3" /> among <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">throughout</st> the <st data-num="3625" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="4414" class="">ringleader</st><n id="4" /> of the <st data-num="139" class="">sect</st> of the <st data-num="3480" class="">Nazarenes</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3739">He</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="3985" class="">tried</st> to <st data-num="953" class="">desecrate</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">so</st> we <st data-num="2902" class="">arrested</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739">him</st>.<n id="4" />

When you <st data-num="350" class="">examine</st><n id="1" /> him <st data-num="846" class="">yourself</st>, you will be <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="1921" class="">learn</st> <st data-num="3844">from</st> <st data-num="3739">him</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> are <st data-num="2723" class="">accusing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> of doing.”<n id="3" />
The Jews also joined in the verbal attack, claiming that these things were true.
When the governor gestured for him to speak, Paul replied, “Because I know that you have been a judge over this nation for many years, I confidently make my defense.

As <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">verify</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> yourself, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4183">more</st> than <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> ago<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="305">went up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st>.

They did <st data-num="3777" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1256" class="">arguing</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1999 4160">stirring up</st> a <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3777" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3777" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">throughout</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>,<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> they <st data-num="3936" class="">prove</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="4012" class="">things</st><n id="2" /> they are <st data-num="2723" class="">accusing</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> of doing.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="3670" class="">confess</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="3000" class="">worship</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of our <st data-num="3971" class="">ancestors</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">Way</st> (<st data-num="3739">which</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">call</st> a <st data-num="139">sect</st>), <st data-num="4100" class="">believing</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> that is <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>.

I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> (a hope<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3778">these men</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">themselves</st> <st data-num="4327" class="">accept</st> too) that there is <st data-num="3195" class="">going</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> of <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> the <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="94" class="">unrighteous</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3778">This</st> is the reason<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="778" class="">do my best</st> to <st data-num="1223 3956">always</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="677" class="">clear</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> toward <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1223" class="">After</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">several</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st><n id="1" /> I <st data-num="3854" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="1654" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">people</st> <st data-num="1654">gifts for the poor</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="4376" class="">present offerings</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> I was doing when they <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple</st>, <st data-num="48">ritually purified</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756 3326">without</st> a <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="2351" class="">disturbance</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> there are <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="2453">Jews</st> <st data-num="575">from</st> the province of <st data-num="773">Asia</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">should</st> be <st data-num="3918" class="">here</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2723" class="">bring charges</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> they <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="846" class="">men</st> here<n id="1" /> should <st data-num="3004">tell</st> <st data-num="5101">what</st> crime<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="92" class="">guilty</st> of<n id="3" /> when I <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="4892" class="">council</st>,<n id="4" />
other than this one thing I shouted out while I stood before them: ‘I am on trial before you today concerning the resurrection of the dead.’”
Then Felix, who understood the facts concerning the Way more accurately, adjourned their hearing, saying, “When Lysias the commanding officer comes down, I will decide your case.”
He ordered the centurion to guard Paul, but to let him have some freedom, and not to prevent any of his friends from meeting his needs.
Some days later, when Felix arrived with his wife Drusilla, who was Jewish, he sent for Paul and heard him speak about faith in Christ Jesus.

While <st data-num="846">Paul</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="1256" class="">discussing</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>, <st data-num="1466" class="">self-control</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3195" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="2917" class="">judgment</st>, <st data-num="5344" class="">Felix</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1719" class="">frightened</st> and <st data-num="611" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="4198">Go away</st> for <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="1161">and</st> when I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> an <st data-num="2540" class="">opportunity</st>,<n id="6" /> I will <st data-num="3333">send for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”

<st data-num="260">At the same time</st> he was <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1679" class="">hoping</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> would <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5536" class="">money</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="1352" class="">for this reason</st> he <st data-num="3343">sent for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Paul</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4437">as often as possible</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="3656" class="">talked</st><n id="4" /> with <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
After two years had passed, Porcius Festus succeeded Felix, and because he wanted to do the Jews a favor, Felix left Paul in prison.
